alert.note: Alert for St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 20 at 8:13PM CDT until September 20 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Washington County in east central Minnesota... Northeastern Ramsey County in east central Minnesota... Southwestern St. Croix County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 813 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over White Bear Lake, or 8 miles northeast of St. Paul, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Woodbury, Stillwater, Lake Elmo and Afton around 825 PM CDT. Bayport around 830 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hudson, North Hudson and Roberts. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in the Twin Cities.
